meanings.definition: Having the most wrinkles or creases.
meanings.sent1: The rumpliest shirt in the store was the one that had been crumpled up in the corner for weeks.
meanings.sent2: She smoothed out the rumpliest fabric before sewing it into a beautiful dress.
meanings.sent3: The rumpliest paper airplane still managed to fly the farthest in the classroom competition.
meanings.sent4: The rumpliest map led them on the most adventurous journey through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rumpliest blanket was the coziest, wrapping them in warmth on cold nights.

meanings.definition: In a state of being the most disheveled or untidy.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, he came home with the rumpliest hair, full of leaves and twigs.
meanings.sent2: The rumpliest room in the house was always his teenage son's, with clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Despite his rumpliest appearance, he still managed to charm everyone with his friendly smile.
meanings.sent4: The rumpliest garden on the block turned out to be the most enchanting, with wildflowers growing freely.
meanings.sent5: Her rumpliest artwork, with paint splatters and smudges, won first prize in the art competition.
